# googleforms_sheets_protected_range (Resource)

Manages a Google Sheets protected range via spreadsheets.batchUpdate.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `range` (Attributes) Grid range (0-based indices). End indices are exclusive. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--range))
- `spreadsheet_id` (String) Target spreadsheet ID.

### Optional

- `description` (String) Optional description shown to users.
- `warning_only` (Boolean) If true, users are warned when editing the range instead of being blocked.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Composite ID in the format spreadsheetID#protectedRangeId.
- `protected_range_id` (Number) Protected range ID assigned by the API.

<a id="nestedatt--range"></a>
### Nested Schema for `range`

Required:

- `end_column_index` (Number) End column index (0-based, exclusive).
- `end_row_index` (Number) End row index (0-based, exclusive).
- `sheet_id` (Number) Sheet/tab ID (sheetId).
- `start_column_index` (Number) Start column index (0-based).
- `start_row_index` (Number) Start row index (0-based).
